A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Likes
I liked how the film was shot 
The CGI was beautiful

Dislike
The development of the story 
The development of the characters 
Luke Skywalker being ruined
The script itself was poor 
The Humor 

Good and the bad 
The surprise's where surprises couldn't of guessed what would happen however the surprises where let downs and real disappointments. 

Overall it's my least favourite Star wars movie as of yet\, but leaves me with high hopes that it can be salvaged.
